entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 6 except 11 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6 except 11 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of rain. Rain mixed with snow late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016
